typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT a.OrderDate, c.ProductId, c.Quantity, c.UnitPrice, a.Total FROM orderdata a JOIN c IN a.Details A',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> orderdata
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> Item
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> Category
orderdata, Item join(ProductId == ItemId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Item, Category join(CategoryId == CategoryId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document') ~> ordercomplete
